plot: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May are on a mission to take their strong British pounds to the cash strapped people of Spain. They have chosen some discreet, sensitive cars for the job with Clarkson in a McLaren 12C Spider, Hammond driving a Ferrari 458 Spider and May in an Audi R8 V10 Spyder. Sherlock and Star Trek actor Benedict Cumberbatch is the star in the Reasonably Priced Car.—Anonymous
